item.title: Using Python in RStudio
item.description: Using python in RStudio Think about the last time you were using RStudio and needed to use python so you could be able to run regular expression on your data. Well, the time has come all thanks to the reticulate package and reading through this post. The first step is to read in the reticulate package just like you would with any other R package. Also, in order for this to work properly you must be using an R Markdown document.
